en_US.project_summary: Spore Protocol infuses digital assets with enduring value backed by tokenomics, redeemable at any time. Ensures true on-chain ownership, privacy, creative freedom and frictionless interaction.

zh_CN.project_summary: Spore Protocol 是 CKB 团队核心成员的独立项目，目标是利用 CKB 的独特优势，为非同质化代币（NFT）界定新的标准。
